sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When the character performs a Charm, Coercion, or Deception check, he may include Force Dice equal to his Force rating. Each light side force point adds one success to Charm checks. Each dark side force point adds one failure to Coercion or Deception checks. However, every 2 light side force points add 1 threat to Coercion or Deception checks, and every 2 dark side force points add one threat to Charm checks. This does not apply to targets immune to Force powers.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Overwhelm Emotions</name> <number>TAL0001205</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 11:41:30</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9fd140622f7f1490e0f497eef699b648</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 11:41:30</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
